property.description:
5 Stars Real Estate is delighted to offer this Spacious, Well-Maintained Apartment in Spring Oasis

Selling Price: AED 405,000/


Property Details:


● Mid Floor
● Unfurnished
● Vacant Soon
● Studio
● 1 Bathroom
● Spacious Balcony
● Size: 417 sq. ft
● Central A/C & Heating
● Built-in Kitchen
● Spacious Living Room
● Walk-in Closet


Building Amenities:


● Shared Swimming Pool
● Shared Gymnasium
● Lobby in Building
● 24/7 Security
● Monitored by CCTV Camera
● Maintenance
● Nearby Public Transport
● Nearby Supermarket


Community Preview: 



Dubai Silicon Oasis is ‘a city within a city’ and as it’s an integrated community in Dubai, it offers you everything you would need. Moving to Silicon Oasis has its perks. It offers a balanced lifestyle with dedicated commercial spaces and a plethora of residential properties to choose from. The expansive network of roads and defined sub-communities within make it a comfortable and well-connected neighbourhood. The community in Silicon Oasis Dubai is spread over three main parts: an innovative technology park. Villa compounds within the technology park and residential towers dotted across the area. 



To arrange viewings please do not hesitate to call our expert: 
Adeel Khalid
BRN 38958

[redacted phone number]. 


About us:


5 Stars Real Estate Provide Extensive Services Covering All Of UAE Real Estate Needs. We Provide Buying, Selling, Renting. Properties In the UAE Real Estate Market.
